issue.title: [JS] Support custom predicates
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2159](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2159). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now the `DataFrame` interface only supports a pretty basic set of operations, which could be limiting to users. We should add the ability for the user to define their own predicates using callback functions.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2159?focusedCommentId=16369437) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1616
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1616>
